backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, file metadata, transfer records, and AI processing results with access-controlled CRUD operations using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence features to remove principal ID display, avatar URL input, and avatar image rendering from ProfilePage and MobileMenu components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including App, Dashboard, FileTransfer, TransferHistory, OnlineUsers, AIFeatures, QR scanner/dialog, offline features, and styling with mobile-first design patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for UI components including sidebar, charts, and semantic colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with mobile viewport settings, PWA manifest link, theme color, app icons, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, portrait orientation, and shortcuts to transfer, history, and users tabs.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API calls, cache versioning, and background sync for failed transfers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that sets up routing with TanStack Router, handles authentication flow with Internet Identity, manages onboarding/profile setup, and registers service worker for PWA support.
frontend/src/components/AIFeatures.tsx: Provides AI-powered features including image compression with quality slider and file recognition, displaying results in collapsible sections with options to share compressed images.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavBar.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Transfer, History, Users, AI) that includes haptic feedback and safe area insets for mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Displays a fixed top banner showing online/offline connection status with auto-hide after reconnection and appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/DashboardDownloa: Empty file placeholder for downloads tab component.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSentTab: Empty file placeholder for sent files tab component.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component displaying an image, title, description, and optional action button for when no content is available.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches errors and displays a fallback UI with retry and home navigation options.
Bottom sheet context menu for file actions including download, share (using Web Share API), and delete options with loading states.
frontend/src/components/FileTransfer.tsx: Main file transfer component handling file selection, upload progress, receiver selection from online users, file size validation, network warnings, and integration with AI-compressed images.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright text with app branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component displaying app logo, name, loading indicator, theme toggle, and menu button for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-screen login page with branding card that initiates Internet Identity authentication.
Empty file, likely a placeholder for mobile navigation drawer component.
frontend/src/components/NetworkWarningDi: Alert dialog warning users about uploading large files on slow or metered connections, with options to cancel or proceed.
frontend/src/components/OfflineFileShare: Empty file, likely a placeholder for offline file sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingTutori: Multi-slide onboarding dialog with swipe gestures showcasing QR codes, file transfers, and AI features.
frontend/src/components/OnlineUsers.tsx: Displays a list of online users with avatars and profiles, supporting pull-to-refresh and filtering out the current user.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form collecting display name and optional avatar URL with keyboard handling for new users.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: Dialog that generates and displays a QR code for a session ID with countdown timer and download functionality.
Empty file, likely a placeholder for QR code scanning/receiving dialog component.
frontend/src/components/QRScannerModal.t: Modal component that uses device camera to scan QR codes for receiving file transfers, parses session IDs, and navigates to history tab on successful scan.
frontend/src/components/ReceivedDownload: Displays a scrollable list of received files with download buttons, file metadata, and long-press context menu support for file actions.
frontend/src/components/RecentlyReceived: Card component showing the 5 most recently received files with download functionality and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/SentDownloadsLis: Displays sent files as cards with receiver information, download buttons, and long-press context menu support.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDownload: Settings section that fetches and displays received files using ReceivedDownloadsList with loading state.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonCard.tsx: Reusable skeleton loading placeholder card with configurable height for displaying loading states.
Tabbed interface for viewing transfer history with received/sent tabs, action buttons for sending/receiving files, and QR scanner integration.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports branding constants including app name, short name, acronym, and tagline for consistent branding across the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Provides haptic feedback functions (light, medium, success) using the Navigator Vibration API with different vibration patterns for mobile devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA installation prompts by capturing the beforeinstallprompt event, checking installation status, and providing a function to trigger the install dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardHandler.ts: Manages mobile keyboard interactions by scrolling inputs into view on focus, handling blur events, and dismissing the keyboard when tapping outside input fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useLongPress.ts: Implements long-press gesture detection for touch and mouse events with configurable delay, returning event handlers that trigger a callback after the threshold is met.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkInfo.ts: Monitors network connection quality using the Network Information API, detecting connection type, slow connections, data saver mode, and metered connections.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Manages onboarding flow state using localStorage to track completion status and provides a function to mark onboarding as complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientationLock.ts: Controls screen orientation locking to portrait mode using the Screen Orientation API, persisting user preference in localStorage with enable/disable/toggle functions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePullToRefresh.ts: Implements pull-to-refresh gesture for touch devices, tracking vertical swipe distance from the top and triggering a refresh callback when threshold is exceeded.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, file uploads/downloads, transfers, AI processing, and admin functions with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequestIndicator.t: Tracks global loading state by monitoring active React Query fetching and mutation operations, returning a boolean indicating if any requests are in progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeBack.ts: Detects right-swipe gestures from the left edge of the screen to trigger navigation back, with configurable threshold and minimal vertical movement tolerance.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebShare.ts: Wraps the Web Share API to share files from Uint8Array data, checking browser support and handling file conversion for native sharing dialogs.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, safe-area utilities for mobile devices, and a z-index layering system for modals and overlays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard component managing four tabs (transfer, history, users, ai) with URL-based navigation, online status management, and file sharing between AI compression and transfer features.
frontend/src/pages/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile menu page with user profile display, navigation to profile settings, app installation prompt, logout functionality, and swipe-back gesture support.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineDashboard.tsx: Empty file, likely a placeholder for offline functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editing page with display name input, orientation lock toggle for mobile devices, swipe-back navigation, and keyboard handling for input fields.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker at '/sw.js' on window load to enable offline support and PWA functionality.
Downloads transferred files by reading bytes from ExternalBlob backend objects and saving them to the device using the saveToDevice utility.
frontend/src/utils/fileSizeValidation.ts: Validates file sizes with 10MB warning threshold and 50MB error limit, and provides file size formatting utilities for display.
frontend/src/utils/offlineSharePackage.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for offline package sharing functionality.
frontend/src/utils/qrPayload.ts: Encodes session IDs as deep-link URLs for QR codes and parses QR payloads to extract session IDs from either URLs or raw strings.
frontend/src/utils/receivedDownloads.ts: Provides utilities to detect installable packages by extension, format file sizes and timestamps, and filter transfer history for received/sent files by current user.
frontend/src/utils/saveToDevice.ts: Saves files to device using modern File System Access API when available, with automatic fallback to traditional download link method.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/useOnlineStatus.ts: React hook that tracks browser online/offline status by listening to window online/offline events and returning the current connectivity state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including HSL-based color tokens, border radius variables, accordion animations, safe-area viewport height utilities, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state document describing OFS as an Internet Computer-based wireless file sharing application with Internet Identity auth, user profiles, file uploads, QR-code sharing, AI features, PWA/offline mode, and a Motoko backend storing data in-memory with role-based access control.
